__e: If these books are as important as he says, he has good reason to hide.
You have information that's valuable to people I work for.
If these souls were valuable it's because of what they did or the way they saw the world.
And when something's that valuable, there's always someone trying to sell it.
If what he knows is so damn valuable, why aren't we getting it out of him?
He doesn't know what the hell it is, but he knows it's worth a lot.
Which is why he's so valuable to us.
- You might be very valuable to us.
But you're too valuable to us.
Thank you for your precious aid.
Now, listen, this animal is very valuable to me.
You are far too valuable to me to lose you now.
You are far too valuable to me to lose you now.
If I was so precious to you why didn't you keep me?
Which makes them extremely valuable to the guys who run this place.
It's costing us a lot of money to get together like this... because now my time is worth as much as yours.
And I told you your pride isn't worth either of our lives.
Couple hours ago, I was potential dirt to you.
What's worth a lot of money?
You could never be as valuable to them as you are to us. We need you.
I know it must be valuable if you've gone to such lengths to get it.
You are far, far too precious to go anywhere.
And you're too tall to talk to.
what you're doing here is too valuable to jeopardize.
